name: 马克·纳克塔赫·坎那特桑安
name_full: 马克·纳克塔赫·坎那特桑安 Mark Naktakhe Khanatsanan
introduction: 更多中文名：马克·哈那桑·纳克塔赫更多外文名：Naktakhe Khanatsanan，คนัสนันท์ นักตะเฆ่，Mark, มาร์ค，Mark Khanatsan Naktakhe，Markntk国籍：泰国出生日期:1993年2月28日星座：双鱼座社交：markntk马克·哈那桑·纳克塔赫从5岁开始跳舞。他第一次进入演艺圈是在一个名为“S'Question”的团体中报道韩国舞蹈。这个团体是由他和他的朋友组成的。他们有机会在一场音乐会上跳舞，一位森林人看到了马克的潜力。然后，他们派马克去韩国为一家唱片公司练习唱歌和跳舞，为期两年。然而，在练习时，马克的脚受伤了。结果，这结束了马克回到泰国从伤病中恢复的一切。在此之前，马克曾是iWave唱片公司的MJ (Mark-Jin)乐队的歌手。他的搭档是金珠贤。他们的第一首单曲是《今夜》这首歌是三种不同语言的组合:韩语、泰语和英语。这是一位泰国和韩国艺术家的合作。这首单曲获得了很大的成功，并在2013年在粉丝中获得了巨大的成功。目前，马克正在追求演艺事业。他的第一个角色是《2014年拉科恩·乔·塔·瓦安·贾》中的沙立Mark Khanatsan Naktakhe started dancing since he was 5 years old. He first entered the entertainment industry covering Korean dances in a group known as S'Question. The group was formed by him and his friends. They had the opportunity to dance at a concert show, where a forester saw potential in Mark. They then sent Mark to practice singing and dancing for a record label in South Korea for two years. However, while practicing, Mark suffered a foot injury. As a result, this put an end to everything, which had Mark returning to Thailand to recover from his injury.Prior to this, Mark was a former singer for a group known as MJ (Mark-Jin) from iWave record label. His partner was Jin Joo Hyung. Their first single was "Tonight." The song was a combination of three different languages: Korean, Thai, and English. It was a collaboration between a Thai and Korean artist. The single received a lot of success and became a huge hit among fans in 2013.Presently, Mark is pursuing a career in acting. His first role was as Sarit in lakorn Kaew Ta Waan Jai 2014
